statement.p: In 17.39 of the last 46 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{46}}={0.1739}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{46}. \displaystyle{P}={0.1739}\cdot{46}={7.9994}. We round that as requested to 8 to find the days it rained. How many days did it NOT rain?
